attributes.action: change the voting system to allow a vote of no confidence in all the parties who are up for election both in national and local elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the public have no faith in ANY of the political parties or political leaders in this once great country and therefore there MUST be a method for them to register their dissatisfaction rarther than wasting their vote

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
